misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a golfer hailing from Golf Pirkkala and residing in Tampere, Finland, brings a quiet intensity to the greens. While some might be drawn to the limelight, Ofri is known for his meticulous approach and dedication to the intricacies of the game.

Set to make his third appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Ofri's journey in this competition reflects his commitment to continuous improvement. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Ofri's focus remains on the process, diligently refining his skills and strategies each year.

Off the course, Ofri is known to appreciate the thoughtful course designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, who passed away in 2024. He sees in Kuronen's work a reflection of the same dedication to craft that he brings to his own game. With his thoughtful and introspective demeanor, Ofri is sure to leave his mark on the upcoming tournament.
